GWEN STEFANI UPDATES ON BLAKE SHELTON AND THE VOICE USA

Gwen Stefani dons ripped jeans and a colorful fuzzy sweater as she attends son Zuma's baseball game with her youngest Apollo Gwen Stefani stepped out in a stylish, yet comfortable outfit as she and her youngest son Apollo cheered on her middle child Zuma during his baseball game on Saturday. The singer-songwriter, 52, donned a colorful and fuzzy sweater which she wore over a red, white and blue shirt. Stefani added ripped jeans to her ensemble as well as a pair of white combat boots....read Gwen Stefani dons ripped jeans as she attends son's baseball game

Gwen Stefani models an Anaheim Hillbillies sweat outfit as she goes on a grocery store run with husband Blake Shelton in Los Angeles Gwen Stefani showed off her sporty side as she stepped out for a grocery run with husband Blake Shelton. She rocked a navy blue hoodie and sweatpants that said 'Anaheim hillbillies.' Gwen Stefani dresses in sweatsuit and sneakers for grocery store run

Gwen Stefani showcases taut torso in clinging sheer white top as she apes husband Blake Shelton's country star style in cowgirl boots Gwen Stefani showcased her taut torso in a clinging sheer white top when she was spotted out and about in California this week. The 52-year-old smiled radiantly as she enjoyed an outing in Anaheim. Gwen Stefani showcases taut torso in clinging sheer white top

Kate Hudson playfully threatens to snatch her son Ryder's epic Gwen Stefani t-shirt... but the No Doubt frontwoman promises to give the actress 'something better' 'Better put a lock on that closet son cause I'm coming for that tee,' she jokingly captioned the snap, which unexpectedly earned recognition from Stefani. Gwen Stefani leaves a comment on Kate Hudson's photo of her son

Gwen Stefani and ex-husband Gavin Rossdale attend their son Apollo's football game separately in LA They filed for divorce back in 2015 after 13 years of marriage and three children. Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale attend their son's football game

Gwen Stefani, 52, wows on stage in a bright yellow and black tiger-print romper and fishnet tights during Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in LA Gwen Stefani got football fans majorly pumped up for Sunday's big game as she performed during the Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles. Gwen Stefani performs during Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in LA

Halsey rocks a brown mini-dress before performing at the first night of the 2022 Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in Los Angeles Halsey stepped out with a stylish look while hitting the red carpet at the 2022 Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest. Halsey rocks a brown mini-dress at the Super Bowl Music Fest

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton hold hands as they take in her son Apollo's baseball game in Los Angeles where her ex Gavin Rossdale is also seen Gwen Stefani showed off her fashion taste at a baseball game with Blake Shelton and her ex-husband, Gavin Rossdale on Sunday. The 52-year-old singer stunned as she wore a funky outfit. Gwen Stefani looks chic at a ball game with Blake Shelton and her ex

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on PDA in private box during first-ever NASCAR race at LA Coliseum... with her sons also in attendance Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton only had eyes for each other when they packed on PDA in a private box during the first-ever NASCAR race at the L.A. Coliseum on Sunday. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on PDA at NASCAR race in LA

Gwen Stefani shows funky fashion sense in floral jacket and ripped jeans while grocery shopping The 52-year-old singer showed her inimitable fashion sense on Monday while grocery shopping in West Hollywood, California. Gwen Stefani shows funky fashion sense while grocery shopping

EXCLUSIVE: Gavin Rossdale enjoys quality time with ALL FOUR children including eldest Daisy Lowe... as they celebrate her 33rd birthday with outing to Universal Studios Singer Gavin Rossdale surfaced this week in Los Angeles in a rare public sighting with all four of his children. They were spotted enjoying the attractions at Universal Studios Hollywood. Gavin grabs quality time with ALL FOUR children at Universal Studios

Gwen Stefani is overcome with puppy love while snapping several selfies with her pampered pooch Ginger Gwen Stefani shared several shots with her dog, Ginger, to her Instagram Story on Sunday afternoon. The 52-year-old No Doubt frontwoman appeared to be enjoying her time with her pooch. Gwen Stefani snaps several selfies with her pampered pooch Ginger

Gwen Stefani is ever the cool mom in matching sweats and hoodie as she and eldest son Kingston run errands On Saturday afternoon, the 52-year-old No Doubt singer could be seen stepping out with her eldest son Kingston, 15, as they went shopping together. Gwen Stefani is ever the cool mom in matching sweats and hoodie

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton touch down at Van Nuys airport after spending some quality time together in Oklahoma Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton touched down in LA on Tuesday, following their relaxing trip to Oklahoma. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton return to LA after trip to Oklahoma

Gwen Stefani sports sweats and a coat as she boards a private airplane with Blake Shelton in LA... after first Christmas as a married couple The 52-year-old singer looked cozy wearing sweats and a jacket while her country crooner beau trailed behind carrying a massive framed gift after enjoying the holiday season with her children. Gwen Stefani sports sweats at the airport with Blake Shelton in LA

Strictly bosses 'keen to get Anne-Marie on the main series' after singer triumphed on show's Christmas special with Graziano Di Prima Anne-Marie, 30, could appear on the main series of Strictly Come Dancing after triumphing professional dancer Graziano Di Prima, 27, on the Christmas special this year. Anne-Marie 'to appear on main series of Strictly Come Dancing'

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton celebrate first Christmas as married couple with Italian pasta feast The 52-year-old pop singe and Blake Shelton, 45, celebrated their first Christmas together as a married couple with a homemade Italian family feast. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton celebrate Christmas as married couple

Gwen Stefani rocks a raven wig and snowman hoodie on Instagram as she promotes her holiday madness Christmas game Gwen Stefani didn't look like her usual self while appearing on Instagram on Thursday night. She was clad in a raven wig as she posted content for her 12.8 million followers. Gwen Stefani rocks wig on Instagram as she promotes her Christmas game

Gwen Stefani, 52, is an ageless beauty as she lights up stage at Spotify bash and teases husband Blake Shelton for having 'lost on The Voice tonight' Gwen Stefani was agelessly radiant when she hit the stage this Tuesday night at the Spotify Celebrates Wrapped With A Totally Normal Party event held in Los Angeles. Gwen, 52, is an ageless beauty as she lights up stage at Spotify bash

Gavin Rossdale, 56, steps out on lunch date with a brunette mystery woman and her adorable pet pooch in LA Gavin Rossdale was spotted enjoying lunch in Los Angeles with a stunning brunette on Friday afternoon. Gavin Rossdale, 56, steps out on lunch date with a mystery woman

Gwen Stefani has 'too much fun' at Target in a bold red look as she promotes the deluxe edition of her Christmas album Gwen Stefani was red hot as she hit her local Target on Friday in a bright look. She wore track pants and a bomber jacket as she posed for pictures on a shopping cart. Gwen Stefani hits Target in red as she promotes her Christmas album

Gwen Stefani certainly seems in the holiday spirit as she rocks bold red and black ensemble while out in LA Gwen Stefani oozed Christmas glow and spirit in a bold red and black ensemble when she stepped out from her Los Angeles home to take care of some business on Monday. Gwen Stefani certainly seems in holiday spirit out in LA

The Voice: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton proudly show off their wedding rings on results episode The 52-year-old No Doubt singer and Blake Shelton, 45, excitedly showed off their wedding rings on The Voice on Tuesday after getting married in July at the country star's Oklahoma ranch. The Voice: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton show off their wedding rings

Gwen Stefani rocks a cute Santa outfit as she promotes The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration Gwen Stefani looked ready for the holidays to begin in a series of photos she posted to Instagram. The singer, 52, wore a dress patterned like Santa's suit, red with fuzzy white trim. Gwen Stefani rocks cute Santa outfit for magical Disney holiday show

Gwen Stefani is 'grateful' for her first Thanksgiving as Blake Shelton's wife as they spend the holiday in Oklahoma with her children and parents The Don't Speak singer took to Instagram to share her joy over her new marital status as she shared images from the big day which they spent in Oklahoma. She showed images of Blake cooking. Gwen Stefani 'grateful' for first Thanksgiving as Blake Shelton's wife

Gwen Stefani, Julianne Hough, Chance The Rapper and more lend their star power to The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration special on ABC Disney recruited some of the biggest names in entertainment for its sixth-annual The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration special, which airs Sunday on ABC. Gwen Stefani performs during Disney's Magical Holiday Celebration

Gwen Stefani wears winter white and gets into the festive spirit while filming a Christmas special at Disneyland Gwen Stefani channeled Disney princess energy for her performance at Disneyland. She wore a white gown to the event with a patterned flower design. Her blonde hair was in a ponytail. Gwen Stefani looks like a princess after a performance at Disneyland

Inside the twisted decline of celebrity fashion favorite Von Dutch: Docuseries exposes bitter scandals that destroyed the billion dollar brand - from fist fights between founders to creator's MURDER conviction The three-part series, called #TheCurseofVonDutch: A Brand to Die For, aired on November 18. It revealed the behind-the-scenes decline of the brand, which shot to global fame in the early 2000s. The twisted fall of fashion brand Von Dutch exposed in new docuseries

Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton cheer on her son Apollo at a baseball game... while her ex Gavin Rossdale sits TWO ROWS behind them Gwen Stefani, her husband Blake Shelton and her parents Dennis and Patti spent their Sunday cheering on her seven-year-old son Apollo at his baseball game in Studio City. Gwen Stefani, Blake Shelton and Gavin Rossdale attend son's game

Chrissy Teigen embraces kitsch in a bubblegum pink feathered coat and space buns ... as she tries to put her cyberbullying scandal behind her Chrissy Teigen showcased her funky side rocking an ostrich feathered coat in a baby pink shade while stepping out in Los Angeles on Tuesday. Chrissy Teigen embraces kitsch in a pink feathered coat and space buns

Her something new? Bill Gates' daughter Jennifer flashes her garter as she poses with her 'radiant' bridesmaids in throwback snap from her 'fairytale' $2 million wedding to Nayel Nassar Jennifer, 25, shared a new photo from the wedding that took place on October 16. The snap shows her walking with a big smile as her nine bridesmaids stood behind her and held her vail. Jennifer Gates flashes garter in pic from her wedding to Nayel Nassar

Gwen Stefani wraps her legs around husband Blake Shelton after surprise performance of their country duet at final show of her Just A Girl residency Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton looked happy in love as he joined her on stage for a performance of their duet Happy Anywhere. Gwen Stefani wraps her legs around Blake Shelton on stage in Las Vegas

Chrissy Teigen wows in a leggy fringed blazer dress before attending Gwen Stefani show in Las Vegas Chrissy Teigen looked sensational in a leggy fringed black blazer dress before she attended Gwen Stefani's show in Las Vegas on Sunday. Chrissy Teigen wows in a leggy fringed blazer dress

Blake Shelton releases wedding song he wrote and sang as his vows to bride Gwen Stefani on their wedding day: 'We Can Reach The Stars' Blake Shelton released the wedding song he wrote and sang as his vows to bride Gwen Stefani on their wedding day: 'We Can Reach The Stars' Blake Shelton releases his wedding vow song for bride Gwen Stefani

Gwen Stefani shares rare picture with her brother Eric Stefani as he visits her Las Vegas residency The Grammy Award-winning artist, 52, captioned the shot, 'My brother (hero) @ericstefanimation came to #Vegas #justagirl !! love u EMS gx.' Gwen Stefani with brother Eric Stefani as he visits her Vegas show

Gwen Stefani dons leopard skin outfit and sports multiple colors in her mane as she celebrates Halloween The Anaheim, California native wore face makeup with her eyes, nose and lips painted, with whiskers painted on her cheeks. Gwen Stefani dons leopard skin outfit as she celebrates Halloween

'Thank you for your support of our union': Bill Gates' newlywed daughter Jennifer shares heartwarming photo of them on her wedding day as she pays tribute to Microsoft billionaire on his 66th birthday Jennifer, 25, wished her father a happy birthday on Instagram with a new photo of them at her wedding. The Microsoft founder is pictured beaming at his daughter in her gown. Jennifer Gates shares wedding photo with dad Bill on his birthday

Gwen Stefani reveals she had COVID at the onset of the pandemic and was forced to cancel a string of shows The 52-year-old singer returned to the stage for her Just a Girl residency at Zappos Theater on Friday in Las Vegas, which initially began in 2018 with dozens of shows through the years. Gwen Stefani had COVID and had to cancel a string of shows in 2020

Britney Spears marvels at her recent weight loss as she shows off her toned torso in dance video: 'I finally see some definition in my abs!' 'Well... for the love of God I finally see some definition in my abs!!!!' Britney raved as she shared a video of herself dancing to the Bush song Glycerin on Thursday. Britney Spears marvels at her weight loss as she shows off her abs

Newlywed Jennifer Gates thanks Vera Wang for her TWO custom wedding dresses, saying they were 'beyond any of my wildest dreams' Newlywed Jennifer Gates has thanked fashion designer Vera Wang for creating two breathtaking custom bridal gowns for her wedding to beau Nayel Nassar in upstate New York over the weekend. Jennifer Gates thanks Vera Wang for her TWO custom wedding dresses

Gwen Stefani steps out with son Apollo... after sharing a never-seen-before photo and videos of Blake Shelton's proposal Gwen Stefani was spotted out with her 7-year-old son Apollo in Los Angeles on Sunday. The 52-year-old No Doubt singer was seen holding hands with her youngest son as they visited a donut shop. Gwen Stefani seen with her son Apollo after sharing proposal videos

Gwen Stefani cuts a cozy figure in a knit sweater and leggings while grabbing ice cream with Blake Shelton and her three sons in LA The No Doubt hitmaker, 52, led the pack with sons Kingston, 15, and Zuma, 13, while the 45-year-old country crooner trailed behind with her youngest Apollo, seven. Gwen Stefani grabs ice cream with Blake Shelton and her sons in LA

Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton cheer on her son at a baseball game in Studio City... while her ex Gavin Rossdale watched separately Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton spent their Sunday cheering on her son at his baseball game in Studio City. Gwen's ex-husband Gavin Rossdale attended separately. Gwen Stefani, Blake Shelton and Gavin Rossdale attend son's game

Blake Shelton calls his wife Gwen Stefani 'my better half' while celebrating her 52nd birthday The country star and his spouse were seen spending time together while on the dance floor of their wedding reception, which took place at his Oklahoma ranch this past July. Blake Shelton calls his wife Gwen Stefani 'my better half'

Gwen Stefani encapsulates rocker chic in vintage tee and ripped jeans as she steps out in Los Angeles ahead of her 52nd birthday Gwen Stefani showed off her cool-girl style Friday as she stepped out in Los Angeles. The mom looked glamorous in a full face of makeup and a graphic, vintage t-shirt days before her October 3 birthday. Gwen Stefani is rocker chic in vintage tee and jeans as she steps out

Gwen Stefani shows off long blonde hair extensions and ripped jeans for a day out shopping in LA Gwen Stefani stepped out in Los Angeles for a little afternoon shopping. The singer wore a red, yellow and gray flannel and jeans with large holes ripped at the knees. She donned a pair of white shoes Gwen Stefani steps out in Los Angeles with Stefani/Shelton necklace

Gwen Stefani reveals the moment she 'said yes to the dress' that she wore when she married Blake Shelton Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton tied the knot last July in an elaborate ceremony at the couple's ranch in Oklahoma. On Monday, the singer revealed the moment that she said yes to the dress. Gwen Stefani reveals the moment she 'said yes to the dress'

Gwen Stefani rocks a sparkling bodysuit with denim shorts while on tour with husband Blake Shelton Gwen Stefani shared photos from her husband Blake Shelton's Friends and Heroes Tour. The singer wore a denim jacket over a sheer and sparkly shirt. She wore bedazzled shorts and boots. Gwen Stefani rocks sparkly bodysuit on tour with husband Blake Shelton

Gwen Stefani, 51, looks much younger than her years in an oversized flannel shirt and ripped jeans as she touches down in Los Angeles via a private jet Gwen Stefani personified the 1990s as she stepped off a private jet in Los Angeles. The singer, 51, wore a total grunge outfit including an oversized flannel, ripped jeans and checkered Vans. Gwen Stefani embodies the '90s in flannel and jeans, arrives in LA

Gwen Stefani performs her No Doubt hit Don't Speak with newlywed husband Blake Shelton on the guitar during their 'Honeymoon Tour' They got married this summer and are continuing to make beautiful music together. Gwen Stefani took a moment on Thursday to post a snippet from her concert the night before. Gwen Stefani performs Don't Speak with Blake Shelton on guitar in Ohio

Gwen Stefani, 51, and Blake Shelton, 45, are seen leaving their ritzy La Jolla hotel... after taking her sons to the San Diego Zoo Safari Park Gwen Stefani has style like no other. The singer stepped out of her San Diego hotel looking fashionable in a pair of plaid pants. The blonde beauty balanced them with a white tank top. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton leave San Diego hotel with son Zuma

Gwen Stefani shares cute photos of her son Zuma to celebrate his 13th birthday: 'We love u so much!!' Gwen Stefani celebrated her son Zuma Nesta's 13th birthday on Saturday with a sweet post on Instagram.The singer shared photos of Zuma as a baby and as a teenager with her followers. Gwen Stefani celebrates her son Zuma's 13th birthday with cute photos

Gwen Stefani joyfully shares footage of her preserved wedding gown and bouquet of flowers from designer Vera Wang... one month after marrying Blake Shelton Roughly five weeks later, Gwen Stefani is still glowing from her and husband Blake Shelton's glorious wedding day. Gwen Stefani joyfully shares pics of preserved Vera Wang wedding gown

Gwen Stefani sports a bold tie-dye jacket and patterned face mask as she heads out for errands in Beverly Hills She recently wed her country star fiancé wearing a stunning Vera Wang dress. Gwen Stefani sports a bold tie-dye jacket as she heads out for errands

'We kept it small, get over it': Blake Shelton reveals 'awkward conversations' with friends who were not invited to his and Gwen Stefani's lavish wedding 'I've had awkward conversations with so many of my friends. "Oh, oh, yeah. I read about that. How was that?" Listen, we kept it small, get over it,' the Voice star said on the Storme Warren. Blake Shelton reveals 'awkward conversations' with over small wedding

Gwen Stefani wears her heart on her shoes as she steps out in favorite checkered Vans imprinted with husband Blake Shelton's face The 51-year-old singer radiated beauty while running errands in her favorite Anaheim Hillbillies sweatpants nearly one month after her Oklahoma ranch wedding. Gwen Stefani wears favorite Vans imprinted with Blake Shelton's face

Miranda Lambert brings the drama in orange fringe and glitter tights at CMA Summer Jam...one night after ex Blake Shelton introduced 'Gwen Stefani Shelton' during performance One night after her ex Blake Shelton took the stage with now-wife 'Gwen Stefani Shelton', Miranda Lambert lit up night two of CMA Summer Jam in Nashville, Tennessee Miranda Lambert dons glitter and fringe look at CMA Summer Jam

Blake Shelton introduces his new wife as 'Gwen Stefani Shelton' during CMA Summer Jam duet...three weeks after tying the knot Just three weeks after tying the knot it seems Gwen Stefani has already legally changed her last name. At CMA Summer Jam, Blake Shelton introduced her as 'Gwen Stefani Shelton' Blake Shelton introduces Gwen Stefani as 'Gwen Stefani Shelton'

Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton embrace sweetly as they join Carrie Underwood as performers at CMA Summer Jam in Nashville It was one of her first performance appearances since becoming Mrs. Blake Shelton. And Gwen Stefani shined on Tuesday night, at the CMA Summer Jam in Nashville, Tennessee. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton embrace at CMA Summer Jam in Nashville

Gwen Stefani and rocker ex-husband Gavin Rossdale keep a safe distance at son's football game ... weeks after her wedding to Blake Shelton Gwen Stefani was spotted keeping a safe distance from her ex-husband Gavin Rossdale while sitting on the sidelines at their son's football game on Sunday. Gwen Stefani and ex-husband Gavin Rossdale keep their distance

Gwen Stefani's children made her wedding ceremony to Blake Shelton official as they signed off as witnesses to Oklahoma nuptials The 51-year-old rockstar enlisted the help of her oldest sons, Kingston, 15, and Zuma, 12, to make the wedding official, according to documents obtained by TMZ. Gwen Stefani's children signed as witnesses to Blake Shelton wedding

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on the PDA as they celebrate two weeks of marriage with a joint performance in Wisconsin The No Doubt singer, 51, packed on the PDA with her new husband, 45, as they locked lips in front of the audience in Twin Lakes. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on the PDA on stage in Wisconsin

Gwen Stefani celebrates her two-week marriage anniversary with a new wedding snap of her and Blake Shelton plus Carson Daly Gwen Stefani is celebrating two weeks of wedded bliss with Blake Shelton with a brand new wedding snap. Gwen Stefani celebrates her two-week marriage anniversary

'I thought it was Gwen Shelton now!' Gwen Stefani teases husband Blake Shelton after he calls her by maiden name during intimate performance Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton gave fans a night to remember when they performed at the country star's Ole Red Bar in Tishomingo, Oklahoma on Thursday. Gwen Stefani teases Blake Shelton after he calls her by maiden name

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton put on a surprise public performance at his Oklahoma bar... after the newlyweds put their honeymoon on hold Gwen Stefani, 51, and Blake Shelton, 45, put on an impromptu free public performance at his bar in Tishomingo, Oklahoma, on Thursday. Gwen Stefani and Blake Sheltons sing at his Oklahoma bar

Gwen Stefani and her new husband Blake Shelton are 'skipping traditional honeymoon as they return back to Los Angeles to focus on work' Gwen Stefani and her new husband Blake Shelton have decided to skip the traditional honeymoon in order to keep up with their busy careers, according to People . Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton are 'skipping traditional honeymoon'

Gwen Stefani and new husband Blake Shelton pose with her suited-up sons in heart-melting wedding day photo The kids, Kingston, 15, Zuma, 12, and Apollo, seven, were all looking sharp in their tuxedos as they posed with their new step-father on his Oklahoma ranch. Gwen Stefani and new husband Blake Shelton pose with her sons

Gavin Rossdale appears downcast while out for a solo stroll in LA with beloved pet Pomeranian... after ex Gwen Stefani married Blake Shelton The 55-year-old Bush frontman sported a forest green Playboy bunny T-shirt with the brand's logo across the front as me made his way through a park in Los Angeles on Tuesday afternoon. Gavin Rossdale appears downcast after ex Gwen married Blake Shelton

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton tied the knot at his backyard chapel in Oklahoma with just 40 guests because they 'didn't want a circus': 'Family was at the center of everything' Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton got married on July 3rd at a chapel on his ranch in Oklahoma. The singers tied the knot at his ranch in Tishomingo, Oklahoma with just 40 guests. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton tied the knot at his backyard chapel

Gwen Stefani is radiant in her plunging Vera Wang wedding dress... complete with custom veil embroidered with the names of her three sons and husband Blake Shelton Gwen Stefani gave her followers the best look at her custom wedding dress with a fitted bodice and floor-length tulle skirt. Gwen Stefani shows off her wedding dress and handmade veil

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's wedding was 'elegant but down home' says officiant Carson Daly as he shares new images from the Oklahoma nuptials 'The best way to describe it is it was perfectly them - the whole weekend and the marriage itself,' the star said. 'It was as elegant and refined and cool as Gwen is, and it was as country.' Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's wedding 'elegant' says Carson Daly

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's life in Oklahoma: The ranch where they wed is a quiet place to unwind away from Hollywood The punk rocker and the country crooner said 'I do' on his sprawling Tishomingo, Oklahoma ranch that he purchased over a decade ago. Here is a look at ranch life. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's life in Oklahoma

The Voice host Carson Daly officiated at Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's Oklahoma ranch wedding but former fellow coach Adam Levine was absent Blake and Gwen exchanged vows on Saturday in front of about 40 guests in a small chapel specially built on the country music's star's ranch. Carson Daly officiated at Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton's wedding

PICTURED: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton host stunning wedding festivities at charming little chapel built on the country crooner's Oklahoma ranch for their special day Pictures have emerged capturing the lovely chapel on Blake's ranch where the power couple exchanged vows in front of friends and family on Saturday.
